{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PROLiNK |model=WNR1008 |revision= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=PROLiNK_WNR1008 |default_ssid_regex=^PROLiNK_WNR1008$ |default_ch= |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=90:61:0C |oui_eth=90:61:0C }}''3.75G Wireless-N 4-Port Gigabit Router''
[http://www.prolink2u.com/new/products/index.php?cid=287 Product page]
[http://www.prolink2u.com/download/um/um_WNR1008_ver1.00_02.12.2010.pdf Manual] According to [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=31420 this OpenWrt forum post], the device has 16MB FLA and 64MB RAM.
